Uses of Interface
squidpony.squidgrid.fov.FOVSolver

  • Packages that use FOVSolver 
    Package Description
    squidpony.squidgrid.fov  

    • Uses of FOVSolver in squidpony.squidgrid.fov

      Classes in squidpony.squidgrid.fov that implement FOVSolver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FOVTranslator
      An Adapter which wraps a FOVSolver and allows the input and output of multiple types.
      class  MergedFOV
      Deprecated.  
      class  RayCastingFOV
      Deprecated.  
      class  RippleFOV
      Performs FOV by pushing values outwards from the source location.
      class  ShadowFOV
      Recursive shadowcasting FOV.
      class  SpreadFOV
      Performs FOV by pushing values outwards from the source location.
      class  ThreadedFOVSolver
      A threaded wrapper for an FOVSolver.
      Constructors in squidpony.squidgrid.fov with parameters of type FOVSolver 
      Constructor and Description
      FOVTranslator(FOVSolver solver)
      Creates an empty instance.
      ThreadedFOVSolver(FOVSolver solver)
      Simply wraps a solver in order to thread it.
      ThreadedFOVSolver(FOVSolver solver, int startx, int starty, float radius)
      Builds a FOVSolver which will use the default RadiusStrategy for calculations when used as a standard Thread.
      ThreadedFOVSolver(FOVSolver solver, int startx, int starty, float force, float decay, RadiusStrategy strategy)
      Builds a FOVSolver which will use the full information for calculations when run as a Thread.
